attributes.action: allow the public to re-elect or change their MP immediately by calling an election, recognising that the electorate are appalled at the current Parliamentary expenses revelations and have lost confidence in all Members of Parliament irrespective of party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current situation of Parliamentary expenses is unacceptable and has revealed apparent fraud, and bad practice on a monumental scale such that public confidence in Members of Parlaiment has plummeted to its lowest level ever. Consequently the public should be given the opportunity to reaffirm thir confidence in their MP or to choose a replacement and that should happen as soon as is legally possible

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
